column4: OK, what do you guys think about partitoins, top or bottom scheme: http://www.ucalgary.ca/~stmichal/diskpart.jpg
i hope that schematic makes sense
I would separate my linux an windows partitions to be in separate blocks, not mixed together.....if I've got your diagram right....
on top i've got 3 primary partitions (or are they called extended.. ), each with 2 logical parts.  on bottom, i've got the active partition, and one extended with 5 logical
